name: Say "LIIIIIIIIG" !
description:
Test your communication skills!

Say "LIIIIIIG" ! is a 2 Player game where communication is key to succeed.

One of the players will have a couple of photos which he will have to describe to his partner. The other player will have to reproduce them in the game as faithfully as possible.

Controls How to play ?

Download the .zip file. You will find inside two files : the PDF which contains the photos to be described, and the executable of the game. It's up to you to choose who will take on which role.

PS : Our apologies, the first part of the PDF is not translated into English, here is a translation :

Welcome in Say "LIIIIIIG" !
Your role, to you who see this document, is to transcribe the information you will see on the following photos, so that your teammate can reproduce them as faithfully as possible. There are a total of 6 photos to take. Be careful, you have the right to only one test per photo, so remember to give as many details as possible about what you see. Moreover, it is strictly forbidden for either of the two players to look at his teammate's screen.  You are free to choose the order in which the photos are taken, however be careful not to spend too much time there. With that, good luck!

 Team

Project Lead & Tech Artist • Ema Ouardi
Game Artists • Ema Ouardi, Tom Segaux, Galadriel Lavasier and Chloé Mathias
Game Programmers • Chloé Mathias, Kévin Verhaeghe and Tom Ségaux
